anya-e1214n1:2: Tuda byathāyaṃ (tu) nuda kkhepaṇe likha lekhaṇe,
anya-e1214n1:3: Kuca saṅkocane rica kkharaṇe khaca bandhane;
anya-e1214n1:11: Puṇo subha kiraye vatta vattane cata yācane,
anya-e1214n1:18: Kapa acchādane vappa vāraṇe khipa peraṇe;
anya-e1214n1:20: Supo saye chupo phasse (vattate) capa sāntvane,
anya-e1214n1:23: Sumbha saṃsumbhane jambha jambhane jubha nicchubhe,
anya-e1214n1:24: Ṭhubha niṭṭhubhane camu adane chamu hīḷane;
anya-e1214n1:26: Jhamu dāhe chamu adane irīya vattane’(pi ca),
anya-e1214n1:32: Tila snehe cila vāse hila hāve silu’ñchane,
anya-e1214n1:33: Bila bhede thūla caye kusacchedana pūraṇe;
anya-e1214n1:36: Phula phasse musa theyye thusa appikirayāya (tu)
anya-e1214n1:44: Nī pāpaṇe muna ñāṇe hana hiṃsāgatīsu (’pi)
anya-e1214n1:46: Pārakkhaṇamhi pā pāne brū vācāyaṃ viyattiyaṃ,
anya-e1214n1:47: Bhā dittiyaṃ mā pamāṇe (atho) yā pāpuṇe (siyā;)
anya-e1214n1:50: Asa (dhātu) bhuvi (khyāto) si saye sā samatthiye;
